Licensed banks shall adhere to the following with immediate effect, until 31 December

column2: Refrain from buying-back of its own shares.
Refrain from increasing management allowances and payments to Board of Directors.
Refrain from incurring non-essential and/or non-urgent expenditure and have a Board
approved policy to rationalise if such expenditure is to be incurred.
